summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1612, for the improvement of Evanston Avenue, from North Forty-first Street to Bowdoin Place and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 17175 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
